com.mapzen.tangram

Interface MapController.MarkerPickListener

  • Enclosing class:
    MapController

    public static interface MapController.MarkerPickListener
    Interface for a callback to receive the picked Marker Triggered after a call of MapController.pickMarker(float, float) Listener should be set with MapController.setMarkerPickListener(MarkerPickListener)

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onMarkerPick(MarkerPickResult markerPickResult, float positionX, float positionY)
      Receive information about marker found in a call to MapController.pickMarker(float, float)

    • Method Detail

      • onMarkerPick

        void onMarkerPick(MarkerPickResult markerPickResult,
                  float positionX,
                  float positionY)
        Receive information about marker found in a call to MapController.pickMarker(float, float)
        Parameters:
        markerPickResult - The MarkerPickResult the marker that has been selected
        positionX - The horizontal screen coordinate of the picked location
        positionY - The vertical screen coordinate of the picked location
